Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 1% for every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.

Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 2% for every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 30%.

Effect (Global): Automatically casts Shifta on self every 14 seconds. Uses your currently learned level of Shifta.

Effect ends when switching to a different weapon, even if it also has this Ability.

Effect (English): Increases power by 5% and reduce damage taken by 12% in the Extreme Quest [Solo Training: Phanatical Phantoms].

Effect (Global): Recovers 10 PP when successfully performing a Perfect Guard.

Effect (English): Survive one fatal hit with 1 HP remaining. Does not activate if HP is at 1. Activates once per Quest.
Effect (Global): Survive one fatal hit with 1 HP remaining. Does not activate if HP is at 1. Activates once per Quest.

Effect (JP): 最大PPに応じて攻撃時PP回復量、PP自然回復量、PP消費軽減効果が最大で30%上昇。

Amount:
(MaxPP - 120)/10
Effect (Global):
Improves Natural and Active PP recovery and reduces PP consumption based on your maximum PP, up to 30% at 420 max PP.
Amount:
(MaxPP - 120)/10

Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, Snowgleam, Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, decreases PP consumption by 30%, but decreases Natural PP Recovery by 30%

PA・テクニックの命中後4秒間の与ダメージ量に応じて、

Effect (English):
Upon hitting with a PA/Technique, tracks 30% of damage dealt within the next 4 seconds, and then deals additional damage to the next PA/Technique based on the damage dealt, up to 250,000 damage.
Additional damage only affects 1 target, but damage is tracked from all targets.
Is always considered an attack from behind.
10 seconds cooldown.
Effect (Global):
Upon hitting with a PA/Technique, tracks 30% of damage dealt within the next 4 seconds, and then deals additional damage to the next PA/Technique based on the damage dealt, up to 250,000 damage.
Additional damage only affects 1 target, but damage is tracked from all targets.
Is always considered an attack from behind.
10 seconds cooldown.

Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 50% when attacking an enemy affected by Weak Bullet, Jellen, or a Status Effect.
Effect (Global): Critical Hit Rate increased by 50% when attacking an enemy affected by any Status Ailment, including Jellen and Blight Rounds.
Condition (English): Enemy afflicted with a Status Effect.

Effect (JP): 花・海・葉・月・雪・影のいずれかが発動中一度に500以上のダメージを受けるとHPが500回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 500 HP upon taking 500 HP or more in damage while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, S1:White Snow Flash, S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.

Effect (Global): Recover 40 PP every 10 seconds when there is a boss enemy nearby.

Every 10 seconds, generates 2 circles around your character that close in on each other.
Evade when the 2 circles overlap to trigger any successful evasion effects (e.g. Hero Counter) as if you evaded an enemy attack.
If you do not evade, recovers 5% HP instead.
Effect (Global):
Every 10 seconds, generates 2 circles around your character that close in on each other.
Evade when the 2 circles overlap to trigger any successful evasion effects (e.g. Hero Counter) as if you evaded an enemy attack.
If you do not evade, recovers 5% HP instead.

Effect (Global): Increases Active PP Recovery by 60% when attacking enemies afflicted by a status ailment, Jellen, or Blight Rounds.

You and all party members recover HP and PP when a nearby enemy or boss dies.
Self: 40% HP, 40 PP on boss kill, 5% HP, 5 PP on enemy kill.
Party: 20% HP, 20 PP on boss kill, 3% HP, 3 PP on enemy kill.
Effect (Global):
You and all party members recover HP and PP when a nearby enemy or boss dies.
Self: 40% HP, 40 PP on boss kill, 5% HP, 5 PP on enemy kill.
Party: 20% HP, 20 PP on boss kill, 3% HP, 3 PP on enemy kill.

Effect (English): Increases damage by 4% when attacking an enemy affected by a Status Effect, Jellen, or Weak Bullet.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 4% when attacking enemies afflicted by a status ailment, Jellen, or Blight Rounds.
Condition (English): Enemy afflicted with a Status Effect.

Effect (English):
Performance changes when Just Guarding with a Weapon Action.
Sealed Form: Recovers 15% HP every 10s, immunity to flinch and knockback.
Unsealed Form: Increases damage by 4%, reduces PP consumption by 15%, 10% chance when hit to reduce damage by 99%.
Returns to Sealed Form when Sword Gear depletes.
Sword only.
Effect (Global):
Performance changes when Perfect Guarding with a Weapon Action.
Sealed Form: Recovers 15% HP every 10s, immunity to flinch and knockback.
Unsealed Form: Increases damage by 4%, reduces PP consumption by 15%, 10% chance when hit to reduce damage by 99%.
Returns to Sealed Form when Sword Focus Gauge depletes.
Sword only.

Effect (JP): ジャストガード成功時15秒間ギア消費なし。威力2%上昇。自在槍限定。

Increases damage by 2%.
Consume no Gear for 15 seconds after performing a Just Guard.
Wired Lance only.
Effect (Global):
Increases damage by 2%.
Upon successfully executing a Perfect Guard, Focus is no longer consumed for 15 seconds.
Wired Lance only.

ダッシュ状態時接触した敵にダメージ。ダッシュの停止時衝撃波が発生。
威力2%上昇。長槍限定。

Increases damage by 2%.
Inflicts 300% potency damage when you touch an enemy while running. Unleashes a 1000% potency shockwave forwards when you stop running.
Partizan only.
Effect (Global):
Increases damage by 2%.
Inflicts 300% potency damage when you touch an enemy while running. Unleashes a 1000% potency shockwave forwards when you stop running.
Partisan only.

Increases damage by 2%.
When Gear Gauge is maxed, Partizan Gear will not be consumed while airborne.
Partizan only.
Effect (Global):
Increases damage by 2%.
When Focus Gauge is maxed, Partisan Focus Gauge will not be consumed while airborne.
Partisan only.

Effect (JP): PP50%を境にPPの消費量と回復速度が変化。双小剣限定。

Reduces Natural PP Recovery to 0 while PP is above 50%.

Effect (Global):
Reduces Natural PP Recovery to 0 while PP is above 50%.
Reduces PP consumption by 30% and increases Natural PP Recovery by 100% while PP is below 50%.
Twin Daggers only.

DSウィンドパリング成功時、ギアが上昇し強力な連撃で切り刻む。
威力上昇2%。両剣限定。

Upon successfully executing a [Double Saber Wind Parry], Gear Gauge is set to maximum and unleash a counterattack with Scissor Edge.

Increases damage by 2%.

Increases damage by 2%.
Upon successfully evading an attack with Sway, unleashes a counterattack with a large Meteor Fist.

Knuckles only.

Increases damage by 2%.
Stops Natural PP Recovery. Increases Active PP Recovery by 50%.
Restores 100 PP upon successfully evading an attack with Sway or Step.
Knuckles only.
